title: Hotel Sara
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Small hotel with a restaurant known as Comidas Sara, located just meters from both Tica bus and Transporte Del Sol international bus terminals. Offers some vegetarian dishes of which a few are or can be veganized. Try a plate with rice, beans, salad, and tortilla bread. No animal fat used in rice and beans. NOTE: please send map coordinates to happycow!
streetAddress: next to Tica Bus international bus terminal
